resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Bonjour et bievenue sur POC by Nico !
C\'est dans cette appli que je réalise mes différents tests et POCs !
Pour découvrir les fonctionnalités, cliquez sur l\'un des boutons suivants :

They told him don't you ever come around here
 Don't want to see your face, you better disappear
 The fire's in their eyes and their words are really clear
 So push it, just push it
 You better run, you better do what you can
 Don't want to see no blood, don't be a macho man
 You want to be tough, better do what you can
 So push it, but you want to be bad
 Just push it, push it, push it, push it
 No one wants to be defeated
 Showin' how funky and strong is your fight
 It doesn't matter who's wrong or right
 Just push it, push it
 Just push it, push it
 Just push it, push it
 Just push it, push it
